ValidationRule.description: Restrict non Data Migration users from creation partners users. Under condition if contact is already in progress of onboarding.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(OR($Profile.Name = 'Integration API Only Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Data Loader Profile')), NOT(ISBLANK(ContactId)), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Contact.Authentication_Status__c, '')), ISNEW() )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorized to create Partner Users
